text: Soonna ah inbool berou haalna kheemkam kachoi leiilaak marwaan tirton inkhat heiwa ah maichaam inn khan ajuongir, amadiang berou katamtak kha Pathian mi ngai'n Pathian diang inni ngaikhale minchunli reng in-ongna mun ma-ah kaom soonna ah inbool Pathian maichaam inn khan juokapeii sik-ah aleiom. Amo 9:1; Suok 30:1,3
